operationId EgldEstimateGas
summary Estimate the fee for an Elrond transaction
description 2 credits per API call
Get an estimated gas price and the number of gas units needed for an Elrond transaction The gas price is obtained from https//gatewayelrondcom/network/config The gas limit is obtains from https//gatewayelrondcom/transaction/cost
